attributes.action: urge the Post Office to think again about its wholesale branch closure programme in the North East and North Yorkshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government and the Post Office are looking to close more than 100 branches across the North East and North Yorkshire. Nationally more than 2500 branches are under threat. We say a local post office is the heart of any thriving community and a short-sighted closure programme would deal a devastating blow to the families who run them and the people they serve. This lifeline must not be lost.

rejection.details: We need a named individual as the creator of the petition.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
